ClearTables.document: This API is used to clear table data based on the specified table information.
ClearTables.name: Clears table data

CompareIdlFiles.document: This API is used to select a target table, upload and verify the table modification file, and return the result of whether the table structure is allowed to be modified.
CompareIdlFiles.name: Uploads and verifies table modification file

CreateBackup.document: This API is used to create a backup task.
CreateBackup.name: Creates backup

CreateCluster.document: This API is used to create a TcaplusDB cluster.
CreateCluster.name: Creates cluster

CreateSnapshots.document: This API is used to create one or more table snapshots at a specified past time point.
CreateSnapshots.name: Creates table snapshots

CreateTableGroup.document: This API is used to create a table group in a TcaplusDB cluster.
CreateTableGroup.name: Creates table group

CreateTables.document: This API is used to create tables in batches based on the selected IDL file list.
CreateTables.name: Creates tables in batches

DeleteCluster.document: This API is used to delete a TcaplusDB cluster, which will succeed only after all resources (including table groups and tables) in the cluster are released.
DeleteCluster.name: Deletes cluster

DeleteIdlFiles.document: This API is used to delete a target IDL file by specifying the cluster ID and information of the file to be deleted. If the file is associated with a table, deletion will fail.
DeleteIdlFiles.name: Deletes IDL description file

DeleteSnapshots.document: This API is used to delete one or more table snapshots.
DeleteSnapshots.name: Deletes table snapshots

DeleteTableDataFlow.document: This API is used to disable data subscription for tables.
DeleteTableDataFlow.name: Disables data subscription for tables

DeleteTableGroup.document: This API is used to delete a table group.
DeleteTableGroup.name: Deletes table group

DeleteTableIndex.document: This API is used to delete the global index from a table.
DeleteTableIndex.name: Deletes the global index from a table

DeleteTables.document: This API is used to drop a specified table. Calling this API for the first time means to move the table to the recycle bin, while calling it again means to drop the table completely from the recycle bin.
DeleteTables.name: Drops table

DescribeClusterTags.document: This API is used to get the associated tag list of a cluster.
DescribeClusterTags.name: Gets the associated tag list of a cluster

DescribeClusters.document: This API is used to query the TcaplusDB cluster list, including cluster details.
DescribeClusters.name: Queries cluster information list

DescribeIdlFileInfos.document: This API is used to query table description file details.
DescribeIdlFileInfos.name: Queries table description file details

DescribeMachine.document: This API is used to query the available machines in a dedicated cluster.
DescribeMachine.name: Queries the available machines in a dedicated cluster

DescribeRegions.document: This API is used to query the list of regions supported by the TcaplusDB service.
DescribeRegions.name: Queries region list

DescribeSnapshots.document: This API is used to query the list of table snapshots.
DescribeSnapshots.name: Queries the list of snapshots

DescribeTableGroupTags.document: This API is used to get the associated tag list of a table group.
DescribeTableGroupTags.name: Gets the associated tag list of a table group

DescribeTableGroups.document: This API is used to query the table group list.
DescribeTableGroups.name: Queries table group list

DescribeTableTags.document: This API is used to get table tags.
DescribeTableTags.name: Gets table tags

DescribeTables.document: This API is used to query table details.
DescribeTables.name: Queries table details

DescribeTablesInRecycle.document: This API is used to query the details of a table in recycle bin.
DescribeTablesInRecycle.name: Queries the details of table in recycle bin

DescribeTasks.document: This API is used to query the task list.
DescribeTasks.name: Queries task list

DescribeUinInWhitelist.document: This API is used to query whether the current user is in the allowlist and control whether the user can create TDR-type apps or tables.
DescribeUinInWhitelist.name: Queries whether the current user is in the allowlist

DisableRestProxy.document: This API is used to disable the RESTful API.
DisableRestProxy.name: Disables the RESTful API

EnableRestProxy.document: This API is used to enable the RESTful API.
EnableRestProxy.name: Enables the RESTful API

ImportSnapshots.document: This API is used to import a snapshot into a new table or the original table from which the snapshot was created.
ImportSnapshots.name: Imports a snapshot

MergeTablesData.document: This API is used to merge tables.
MergeTablesData.name: Merges tables

ModifyCensorship.document: This API is used to enable or disable the cluster operation approval feature.
ModifyCensorship.name: Enables or disables the cluster operation approval feature

ModifyClusterMachine.document: This API is used to modify the machines of a dedicated cluster.
ModifyClusterMachine.name: Modifies the machines of a dedicated cluster

ModifyClusterName.document: This API is used to rename a specified cluster.
ModifyClusterName.name: Renames cluster

ModifyClusterPassword.document: This API is used to change the password of a specified cluster. The backend will allow the TcaplusDB SDK to access databases with both old and new passwords before the old password expires. You cannot submit a new password change request before the old password expires or submit a request to modify the expiration time of the old password after the old password expires.
ModifyClusterPassword.name: Changes cluster password

ModifyClusterTags.document: This API is used to modify cluster tags.
ModifyClusterTags.name: Modifies cluster tags

ModifySnapshots.document: This API is used to modify the expiration time of one or more table snapshots.
ModifySnapshots.name: Modifies table snapshots

ModifyTableGroupName.document: This API is used to rename a TcaplusDB table group.
ModifyTableGroupName.name: Renames TcaplusDB table group

ModifyTableGroupTags.document: This API is used to modify table group tags.
ModifyTableGroupTags.name: Modifies table group tags

ModifyTableMemos.document: This API is used to modify table remarks.
ModifyTableMemos.name: Modifies table remarks

ModifyTableQuotas.document: This API is used to scale a table.
ModifyTableQuotas.name: Scales table

ModifyTableTags.document: This API is used to modify table tags.
ModifyTableTags.name: Modifies table tags

ModifyTables.document: This API is used to modify specified tables in batches based on the selected table definition IDL file.
ModifyTables.name: Modifies table structure in batches

RecoverRecycleTables.document: This API is used to recover a dropped table from the recycle bin. It will not work for tables to be released due to arrears.
RecoverRecycleTables.name: Recovers table from recycle bin

RollbackTables.document: This API is used to roll back table data.
RollbackTables.name: Rolls back table data

SetTableDataFlow.document: This API is used to enable data subscription for tables or modify the feature's configurations.
SetTableDataFlow.name: Enables data subscription for tables or modifies the feature's configurations

SetTableIndex.document: This API is used to create a global index for a table.
SetTableIndex.name: Creates a global index for a table

UpdateApply.document: This API is used to update the application status.
UpdateApply.name: Updates the application status

VerifyIdlFiles.document: This API is used to upload and verify a table creation file and return the definition of tables that are verified to be valid.
VerifyIdlFiles.name: Uploads and verifies table creation file

Whether the expiration policy of cluster Ulog backup file is read-only. `0`: Yes; `1`: No.
